aroma.notes: Fresh, warm, smoky — smells like a quicker extraction, not well developed.

acidity.notes: Sweet, juicy, somewhat puckery yet weak/watery. Somewhat sour overall.

sweetness.notes: Underdeveloped. Fruit notes are more puckery like cranberry juice than fruit punch.

finish.notes: Alkaline taste in back of throat. Grassy aftertaste. Mouth is puckering/tense after sips.

notes: Accidentally did 78g of water. Poured as fast as possible, finished 200g by 1:55, finished pour by 1:17. Lots of boulders at edge due to agitation. Drawdown was much faster — I had to do the Rao spin as soon as I rinsed off my spoon.
actionItem: This was a success — we attempted to change brew time with flow rate only, and ended up shaving 20 seconds rather than 10. Reduce flow rate a bit to get back to the 3:00–3:05 sweet spot.
